title: Use formula
text: The word problem implies an inverse variation formula. This formula is $$L=\frac{k}{f}$$.

title: Find values
text: Since the string has a frequency of 400 cycles per second when the string is 11 inches long, we can assign L to be 11 and f to be 400.

title: Plug in
text: Plug in the values, and solve for k. Then, put the k value into the inverse variation equation.
